name: magenta-converter
description: Universal file conversion suite with neon magenta branding

scripts.dev: npm run dev:setup && concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && turbo run build
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build:shared && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: cp apps/web/.env.local.example apps/web/.env.local 2>/dev/null || true && cp apps/api/.env.example apps/api/.env 2>/dev/null || true
